com.sap.conn.idoc

Interface IDocSegmentMetaData


  • public interface IDocSegmentMetaData
    Interface to access to all meta data of a segment instance.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean equalsIgnoreParent(IDocSegmentMetaData segmentMetaData)
      Checks whether the given segment meta data object is "equal to" this segment meta data object ignoring the parent segment meta data.
      String getApplicationRelease()
      Returns the SAP application release that the associated segment belongs to.
      IDocSegmentMetaData getChild(int index)
      Returns the child segment meta data object at the specified position in the segment meta data object's child list.
      IDocSegmentMetaData getChildByDefinition(String definition)
      Returns the child segment meta data object with the specified segment definition name.
      IDocSegmentMetaData getChildByType(String type)
      Returns the child segment meta data object with the specified segment type.
      IDocSegmentMetaData getChildMatchingDefinition(String definition)
      Returns the child segment meta data object that matches with the specified segment definition name.
      IDocSegmentMetaData[] getChildren()
      Returns an array containing all the segment meta data object's child segment meta data objects in the correct order.
      String[] getChildTypes()
      Returns an array containing all the segment meta data object's child segment meta data types in the correct order.
      String getDefinition()
      Returns the segment definition name of the associated segment.
      String getDescription()
      Returns the short description of the associated segment.
      int getEDIHierarchyLevel()
      Returns the EDI hierarchy level of the associated segment.
      int getHierarchyLevel()
      Returns the hierarchy level of the associated segment.
      String getIDocType()
      Returns the IDoc type that the associated segment belongs to.
      String getIDocTypeExtension()
      Returns the IDoc type extension (CIM type / customer type extension) that the associated segment belongs to.
      String getKey()
      Returns the key value for the segment meta data object.
      long getMaxOccurrence()
      Returns the maximum number of occurrences of the associated segment.
      long getMinOccurrence()
      Returns the minimum number of occurrences of the associated segment.
      String getName()
      Returns the name of the associated record meta data.
      int getNumChildren()
      Returns the number of the segment meta data object's child segment meta data objects.
      IDocSegmentMetaData getParent()
      Returns the segment meta data object's parent segment meta data object.
      IDocRecordMetaData getRecordMetaData()
      Returns the segment meta data object's associated record meta data object.
      String getSystemRelease()
      Returns the SAP system release that the associated segment belongs to.
      String getType()
      Returns the type of the associated segment.
      int indexOfChild(IDocSegmentMetaData segmentMetaData)
      Searches for the first occurrence of the given segment meta data object in the list of child objects, testing for equality using the equals method.

      Checks whether the segment meta data object is a child segment meta data object.
      boolean isLocked()
      Checks whether the segment meta data object is locked.

      Checks whether the associated segment is mandatory.

      Checks whether the associated segment is qualified.
      boolean isRoot()
      Checks whether the segment meta data object is a root segment meta data object.
      void lock()
      Locks this segment meta data object to prevent further changes.

    • Method Detail

      • equalsIgnoreParent

        boolean equalsIgnoreParent(IDocSegmentMetaData segmentMetaData)
        Checks whether the given segment meta data object is "equal to" this segment meta data object ignoring the parent segment meta data. Only the segment meta data subtree objects with all their descendants are compared.
        Parameters:
        segmentMetaData - the segment meta data object to check for equality.
        Returns:
        true if the given object is equal to this segment meta data object; false otherwise.

      • getApplicationRelease

        String getApplicationRelease()
        Returns the SAP application release that the associated segment belongs to.
        Returns:
        the SAP application release that the associated segment belongs to.

      • getChild

        IDocSegmentMetaData getChild(int index)
        Returns the child segment meta data object at the specified position in the segment meta data object's child list.
        Parameters:
        index - index of the child segment meta data object to be returned.
        Returns:
        the child segment meta data object at the specified position in the segment meta data object's child list.
        Throws:
        IndexOutOfBoundsException - if index is out of range (index < 0 || index >= getNumChildren()).

      • getChildByDefinition

        IDocSegmentMetaData getChildByDefinition(String definition)
        Returns the child segment meta data object with the specified segment definition name.
        Parameters:
        definition - the segment definition name of the child segment meta data object to be returned.
        Returns:
        the child segment meta data object with the specified segment definition name or null if there is no child segment meta data object with the specified segment definition name.

      • getChildByType

        IDocSegmentMetaData getChildByType(String type)
        Returns the child segment meta data object with the specified segment type.
        Parameters:
        type - the segment type of the child segment meta data object to be returned.
        Returns:
        the child segment meta data object with the specified segment type or null if there is no child segment meta data object with the specified segment type.

      • getChildMatchingDefinition

        IDocSegmentMetaData getChildMatchingDefinition(String definition)
        Returns the child segment meta data object that matches with the specified segment definition name. A match is successful if the segment definition names are equal or the child segment meta data object's segment type may be calculated from the specified segment definition name. For example the segment type "E1MARAM" may be calculated from the segment definition name "E2MARAM001".
        Parameters:
        definition - the segment definition name to match with the child segment meta data object to be returned.
        Returns:
        the child segment meta data object that matches with the specified segment definition name or null if there is no child segment meta data object matching with the specified segment definition name.

      • getChildren

        IDocSegmentMetaData[] getChildren()
        Returns an array containing all the segment meta data object's child segment meta data objects in the correct order.
        Returns:
        an array containing all the segment meta data object's child segment meta data objects in the correct order.

      • getChildTypes

        String[] getChildTypes()
        Returns an array containing all the segment meta data object's child segment meta data types in the correct order.
        Returns:
        an array containing all the segment meta data object's child segment meta data types in the correct order.

      • getDefinition

        String getDefinition()
        Returns the segment definition name of the associated segment.
        Returns:
        the segment definition name of the associated segment.

      • getDescription

        String getDescription()
        Returns the short description of the associated segment.
        Returns:
        the short description of the associated segment.

      • getEDIHierarchyLevel

        int getEDIHierarchyLevel()
        Returns the EDI hierarchy level of the associated segment. Root segments have EDI hierarchy level 0. Direct child segments of a root segment have either EDI hierarchy level 1 (if they cannot be repeated) or EDI hierarchy level 2 (if they can be repeated). Further descendant segments have an EDI hierarchy level which is one higher than the EDI hierarchy level of their parent segment.
        Returns:
        the EDI hierarchy level of the associated segment.
        Since:
        IDocLibrary 3.1.0

      • getHierarchyLevel

        int getHierarchyLevel()
        Returns the hierarchy level of the associated segment. Root segments have hierarchy level 0. Child segments have a hierarchy level which is one higher than the hierarchy level of their parent segment.
        Returns:
        the hierarchy level of the associated segment.

      • getIDocType

        String getIDocType()
        Returns the IDoc type that the associated segment belongs to.
        Returns:
        the IDoc type that the associated segment belongs to.

      • getIDocTypeExtension

        String getIDocTypeExtension()
        Returns the IDoc type extension (CIM type / customer type extension) that the associated segment belongs to.
        Returns:
        the IDoc type extension (CIM type / customer type extension) that the associated segment belongs to.

      • getKey

        String getKey()
        Returns the key value for the segment meta data object. The key value is a unique ID for the segment meta data object and considers the segment meta data object's IDoc type, IDoc type extension, SAP system and application release and segment definition name.
        Returns:
        the segment meta data object's key value.

      • getMaxOccurrence

        long getMaxOccurrence()
        Returns the maximum number of occurrences of the associated segment.
        Returns:
        the maximum number of occurrences of the associated segment.

      • getMinOccurrence

        long getMinOccurrence()
        Returns the minimum number of occurrences of the associated segment.
        Returns:
        the minimum number of occurrences of the associated segment.

      • getName

        String getName()
        Returns the name of the associated record meta data.
        Returns:
        the name of the associated record meta data.

      • getNumChildren

        int getNumChildren()
        Returns the number of the segment meta data object's child segment meta data objects.
        Returns:
        the number of the segment meta data object's child segment meta data objects.

      • getParent

        IDocSegmentMetaData getParent()
        Returns the segment meta data object's parent segment meta data object.
        Returns:
        the segment meta data object's parent segment meta data object.

      • getRecordMetaData

        IDocRecordMetaData getRecordMetaData()
        Returns the segment meta data object's associated record meta data object.
        Returns:
        the segment meta data object's associated record meta data object.

      • getSystemRelease

        String getSystemRelease()
        Returns the SAP system release that the associated segment belongs to.
        Returns:
        the SAP system release that the associated segment belongs to.

      • getType

        String getType()
        Returns the type of the associated segment.
        Returns:
        the type of the associated segment.

      • indexOfChild

        int indexOfChild(IDocSegmentMetaData segmentMetaData)
        Searches for the first occurrence of the given segment meta data object in the list of child objects, testing for equality using the equals method.
        Parameters:
        segmentMetaData - segment meta data object which the list of child objects is searched for.
        Returns:
        the index of the first occurrence of the segment meta data object in the list of child objects; returns -1 if the segment meta data object was not found.

      • isChild

        boolean isChild()
        Checks whether the segment meta data object is a child segment meta data object.
        Returns:
        true if the segment meta data object has a parent; false otherwise.

      • isLocked

        boolean isLocked()
        Checks whether the segment meta data object is locked.
        Returns:
        true if the segment meta data object is locked; false otherwise.

      • isMandatory

        boolean isMandatory()
        Checks whether the associated segment is mandatory.
        Returns:
        true if the associated segment is mandatory; false otherwise.

      • isParent

        boolean isParent()
        Checks whether the segment meta data object is a parent segment meta data object.
        Returns:
        true if the segment meta data object has at least one child; false otherwise.

      • isQualified

        boolean isQualified()
        Checks whether the associated segment is qualified. A segment is qualified if its first record element is a qualifier field specifying the kind of the segment.
        Returns:
        true if the associated segment is qualified; false otherwise.

      • isRoot

        boolean isRoot()
        Checks whether the segment meta data object is a root segment meta data object.
        Returns:
        true if the segment meta data object has no parent; false otherwise.

      • lock

        void lock()
        Locks this segment meta data object to prevent further changes. After a meta data object has been locked, trying to modify it will cause an IllegalStateException.
